text: Frederick Avey (31 August 1909 – 17 September 1999) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward in the late 1920s and early 1930s. He was born in Poplar, London. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Footballers from Poplar, London Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Leytonstone F.C. players Category:Leyton F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Torquay United F.C. players Category:Tunbridge Wells F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Fred Avey
